## About

Prof. Evandro Fang is a specialist in aging research, focusing on NAD+ metabolism and mitophagy in brain aging. His work investigates the molecular mechanisms that can be targeted to promote healthy brain aging.

## Research Interests

- NAD+ metabolism
- Mitophagy regulation
- Brain aging mechanisms
- Therapeutic interventions
